title: noobshow
author: noobshow
content: We are looking for a talented social media, community manager to help grow our community, grow our social media presence and to create high levels of web, social traffic and customer engagement.You will be responsible for creating original text and video content, managing posts, responding to followers and growing the community. You will manage the protocol/company image in a cohesive way to achieve our marketing goals.This role will include strategic planning but also requires tactical hands-on execution with our social channels.ResponsibilitiesSet specific objectives and report on them routinelyActively follow, find threads and topics to engage with.Perform research on current benchmark trends and audience preferencesDesign and implement social media strategy to align with business goalsBuild, grow and manage our Social Media Presence across all our Social Channels.Communicate with followers, respond to queries in a timely manner and monitor customer reviewsStay up-to-date with current technologies and trends in social media, design tools and applicationsCollaborate with other teams, like marketing, sales and customer service to ensure brand consistencyGenerate, edit, publish and share engaging content daily (e.g. original text, photos, videos and news)Oversee social media accountsâ€™ design (e.g. Facebook timeline cover, profile pictures and blog layout)Suggest and implement new features, promotions, campaigns based on social listening and social sentimentDrive brand awareness and attention to projects, and launches. Careful and methodical when it comes to messaging and tone of voice.RequirementsExcellent copywriting skillsAnalytical mindset and multitasking skillsKnowledge of established and emerging social media channelsHands-on experience producing content for our social media channelsPrevious experience in the crypto/blockchain and/or fintech industryExcellent communication skills, preferably in a remote environmentProven work experience as a social media manager, scaling communities, at least 3 years.Data-informed and metrics driven but know when to go with your gut to capitalize on emerging platforms and social trendsSalary Information:Salary can be paid with mixture of cash and crypto or either of bothProjected Salary Range is Between $35k-$90k annually, including other benefits as shall be discussed.Note: The wide salary range indicates our targeted employee has no limits, from amateur to highly experienced employee.Crypto and/or defi experience is a requirementApply through this link or chat with me on reddit
